City Commission
===============

Meetings
--------

* 5 pm
* 1st and 3rd Wednesday of every month
* City Hall  
  1801 9th Avenue North  
  Kenneth T. Nunn Council Room  
  Texas City, TX 77592

[Request for Mayor or City Commission Participation](https://www.texascitytx.gov/FormCenter/City-Secretary-11/Request-for-Mayor-or-City-Commission-Par-60)
